messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Gratitude.. was paranoid
messages.msgSnippet: Well said. ... From: Dawn Falbe  To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com Sent: Sunday, October 29, 2006 10:02:39 AM Subject:
messages.messageBody:
Well said.


----- Original Message ----
From: Dawn Falbe <dawnfalbe@...>
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, October 29, 2006 10:02:39 AM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Gratitude.. was paranoid

As I was reading the info about fear and paranoid I thought about how
grateful I am when it comes to this life. I am grateful that my husband
supports child centered learning 100% and is with them the majority of the
time. I am grateful that I see what's more important is what hubby and I
and the kids want rather than what the government wants. I am grateful
there is a list like this that helps keep me centered and in touch with what
works for me.

Having done the school thing, homeschooling and unschooling, the last one
works best for my family, me, hubby, Zak & Max. I finally surrendered to
what is and realized there will always be people who question what we do,
whether they are government, "friends", family members or the curious
public. I don't have to answer to any of them if I don't want too and most
of the time answering is justifying. Learning how to smile inwards and
outwards has helped a lot.

Namaste

Dawn.

Dawn M. Falbe
Business Coach, Astrologer, Certified Tarot Reader & Professional Muse

If not you, then who?
Are you ready to start living life to the fullest?
